title: Pixel 2 XL microphone stopped working (after it turned off due to heat)
content:
Started using the phone on Thursday (3-14) and everything worked fine. Friday (3-15) morning I woke up to the message attached. 

During the day I realized my microphone wasn't working because people hung up on me and I couldn't send audios through WhatsApp or Telegram and the google assistant didn't work.

I don't know if these two events are linked (though I've read that heating could cause the microphone solder to fail).

I've already tested the microphone on safe mode and did a factory reset with no positive result. The OTHER microphones work on loudspeaker and when taking video.
